content_parts.content:
You asked. We listened.

You can access and manage attachments from the Attachments tab, which also displays the number of attachments. You can see the full list of attachments and related details. A preview panel opens when you select an image or text file.
Select the upload icon to add attachments.

When you export content in the main list for a page, the process works in the background so you can continue working while data is being exported. In addition, there is no limit to the number of lines you can export so you can export all lines to a single CSV or Excel file.

When complete, the document is available from the Notification centre.

content_parts.title: Stock change when the quantity exceeds stock on hand

content_parts.content: When you try to post a stock adjustment that exceeds stock on hand, the line stays in draft so that you can update the quantity and retry the action.

content_parts.title: Cannot create purchase invoice for certain sites

content_parts.content: You can create a purchase invoice without an error for all company sites.

content_parts.title: Stock adjustment stuck at posting in progress

content_parts.content: You can update a stock adjustment line if the adjustment was not posted.

content_parts.title: An address cannot be modified or added to a site

content_parts.content: You can add and edit an address for a site without errors.
You can create a purchase invoice from a purchase receipt without errors.

content_parts.title: Adding multiple lines to a landed cost invoice causes an error

content_parts.content: You can add multiple lines to a landed cost invoice using the direct entry gird without errors.

content_parts.title: When receiving a purchase order for the same item/lot on 2 different lines, the system returns the second line as an error

content_parts.content: You can create a purchase receipt with the same item and lot number on separate lines.

content_parts.content:
Sage is making German e-invoicing compliance simple and easy.

Your product is now enabled with AI-powered document extraction so you can receive and process Xrechnung and Zugferd e-invoices fast and efficiently. From the Uploaded purchasing document page, you can add documents that are then scanned for invoice data so you stay compliant while eliminating the hassle of manual, time-consuming invoice entry.

This powerful new capability is included in your existing Sage subscription.

content_parts.title: Easy access to view finance notifications

content_parts.content:
When you need to repost a purchasing invoice or credit note or a sales invoice, the Retry icon on the Posting tab opens the Notification history page. Depending on the cause, you can fix errors, such as missing dimensions, and resend or retry as needed.

User permissions to access the Notification history page required.

content_parts.title: Material tracking: Select all component lines

content_parts.content:
You asked. We listened.

If you reserve component stock and allocate it to work orders in advance of production, you can now select all component lines to issue the components at once.

On the new Work in progress transaction inquiry page, you can view work orders and released items, as well as view costs from completed trackings on a main list that scrolls continuously. You can organise and group the inquiry to match your viewing preferences, and group columns to view subtotals.

content_parts.title: Work order component stock quantities and closed date

content_parts.content:
You asked. We listened.

So that you can easily see component stock quantities, additional columns are available to display in the Components grid and a Stock tab was added to the Edit work order component panel.

Closed work orders display the closed date.

content_parts.title: Send emails from your company’s domain

content_parts.content:
You can define an email domain, such as your company’s domain, when an email is sent from the product. Recipients like business partners can clearly identify you as the sender and this helps to avoid your emails being discarded due to spam filters.

When a tenant is created, the default email domain is that of the administrative user, such as user@my.comany.com. The mail sending system sends the email from an address of that domain and the replay email is noreply@my.company.com.

To enable this, you need to configure the email domain by returning the credentials allowing SDMO to send emails on behalf of your domain.

content_parts.content:
Reduce manual data entry by using an AI-powered assistant for accounts payable. Use Sage’s AI capabilities to automate manual data entry, cutting accounts payable processing time in half.

On the Uploaded purchase invoices page, you can upload or retrieve documents from a dedicated email address to the Sage AI service. The emailed documents are automatically scanned and ready for your review when you retrieve them. After you review and confirm data, you can create a purchasing invoice or credit note, so you can easily complete related accounts payable tasks.
